title: Is Florida's shooter a member of the White Somak Group?
subtitle: There is still no evidence that the shooter admitted at the school belonged to any organized hate group, although he stated that he had expressed extremist views from whites on the Internet.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Nicholas Cruz, an armed man recognized in February 2018, was shot at by a school in Parkland, Florida, who was or was a member of a known white or white nationalist organization.
